response.overview: The film tells a small neighborhood and funny stories that come to the inhabitants of this neighborhood. The flow of events begins with Tofiqin (Co≈üqun Rehimov) returning from military service. Annesi (Cuban Eliyeva) finally wants to marry her only son. Tevfik's future father-in-law is "professor" (Avtandil Israfilov). But this professor is not one of the professors you know ...
